meanings.definition: Something that is derived or obtained from a specific source.
meanings.sent1: The derivates of the recipe included flour and sugar.
meanings.sent2: She studied the derivates of the ancient civilization.
meanings.sent3: The derivates of the story were quite unexpected.
meanings.sent4: His artwork was a beautiful derivate of nature.
meanings.sent5: The derivates of the experiment were carefully analyzed.

meanings.definition: A financial instrument whose value is based on the value of an underlying asset.
meanings.sent1: Investing in derivates can be risky.
meanings.sent2: The company's portfolio included various derivates.
meanings.sent3: The derivates market can be quite complex.
meanings.sent4: His success was a direct derivate of his wise investments.
meanings.sent5: Understanding derivates is crucial in the financial world.

meanings.definition: To obtain or receive from a source.
meanings.sent2: He derivates his strength from his family.
meanings.sent3: The team derivates motivation from their coach.
meanings.sent4: The artist derivates creativity from everyday life.
meanings.sent5: They derivates knowledge from books and experience.
